title: Sun Transit in the 4th House for Sagittarius Ascendant
summary: When the Sun transits the 4th house for Sagittarius Ascendant, focus shifts toward home, emotional security, and inner authority. This phase highlights responsibilities related to family, property, and domestic matters. You may feel the need to take charge at home or assert your views strongly within the family. Emotional sensitivity increases if ego dominates comfort zones. When balanced with care and humility, this transit strengthens inner stability, leadership within the household, and pride in roots and foundations.
closing: This Sun transit activates inner authority and home matters. With sensitivity, it builds emotional strength, stability, and respectful leadership at the core.
